history.content:
If you started at Berkeley Fall 2015 or later, the only requirements to declare are CS 61A, 61B and 70 with 3.3 across those classes. You would not need to retake before declaring, but you would want to make sure you work with an advisor to plan out the rest of your semesters.

If you started before Fall 2015, Math 54 is part of the requirements to declare.
Will failing a graduation requirement like Math 54 or EE16A have any bearing on whether or not we are accepted into the L&S CS major? Would we have to retake it before declaring?
history.subject: Failing graduation requirement before declaring
